meanings.definition: Comps: Abbreviation for "comparables," used in real estate to refer to similar properties used for comparison in determining the value of a property.
Comps: Abbreviation for "complimentary," used in the hospitality industry to refer to free or discounted items given to guests.
Comps: Abbreviation for "compositions," used in music to refer to musical pieces or works.
Comps: Abbreviation for "computers," used informally to refer to computer systems or devices.
